description: Jessica Roland is the first woman to be appointed since the role was created in 1969.
title: First female Deputy Bailiff of Guernsey sworn in
title_page: First female Deputy Bailiff of Guernsey sworn in - BBC News
maintext: Of the appointment she said: "I'm incredibly proud, I think I'm particularly proud because of how this island has, and indeed the other islands in this Bailiwick, have reacted to the coronavirus and the lockdown.
